Journal Story: Do not spend the night here.boiling Springs pa.AT campsite right off railroad tracks 50yrds @most.Train passes by every hour all night long.Hostel in town $10.00 pr/night.Boiling springs hotel nice place good food,cold beer. Bartender cool person hiker friendly. Plus post office.Have a grate hike.

Mountain Creek Campground hiker friendly right off the trail if you follow it to the road make a right if you're heading Sobo. About a half mile down the road laundromat restock food. Nice stopping point

Timbers restaurant right off of Route 30 outside of Caledonia State Park as you hit Route 30 make a right if you're heading sobo. Killer Burgers Fries hiker friendly a great change from dehydrated food .https://www.youtube.com/channe... have a great one
From the middle of May  on through the summer, be careful  in Pennsylvania saw plenty of Timber rattlesnakes on the trail  between Boiling Springs. PA and Maryland .
